about_the_game:
You inhaled a strange gas and lost consciousness. When you woke up, you found yourself chained to a gambling table. A strange couple offers you to play a card game and threatens you with a chainsaw and a knife. Will luck be on your side and how will winning this game turn out? Try to defeat a strange couple and find out how this mad story ends!

FEATURES:

  • A card game along with horror.
  • Chickens. Again. For the last time.
  • The finale of a trilogy of games centered on the world of humanoid chickens.
  • Retro-styled graphics.
detailed_description:
You inhaled a strange gas and lost consciousness. When you woke up, you found yourself chained to a gambling table. A strange couple offers you to play a card game and threatens you with a chainsaw and a knife. Will luck be on your side and how will winning this game turn out? Try to defeat a strange couple and find out how this mad story ends!

FEATURES:

  • A card game along with horror.
  • Chickens. Again. For the last time.
  • The finale of a trilogy of games centered on the world of humanoid chickens.
  • Retro-styled graphics.
name: Ells Tales: Idols

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 and up
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 and up
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to the horror card game! Try to defeat a strange couple and find out how this mad story ends!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
